sentences.en: Emperor Akihito of Japan has been enthroned in Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 日皇明仁已在东京登基。

sentences.en: He is expected to be enthroned early next year as the spiritual leader.
sentences.cn: 人们预计他将于明年初作为精神领袖登位。

sentences.en: King of kings salvation brings Let loving hearts enthrone Him.
sentences.cn: 万王之王赐下救赎,心灵当尊他为王.

words.tran_cn: 即位；登基典礼，就任主教的仪式
授予主教职位；登基典礼（等于enthronement）

trans.tran_cn: 使登基；立…为王；任为主教；崇拜
trans.tran_en: if a king or queen is enthroned, there is a ceremony to show that they are starting to rule

trans.tran_cn: 使（国王、女王或主教）登基，即位
